property.value: Your hero has dual wield.1, If your hero is defending against an ally, remove your hero from combat.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you strike with Bloodseeker, your hero has long-range this combat.At the end of your turn, if no damage was dealt with Bloodseeker this turn, put 3 damage on your hero.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When an opponent discards a card, put a +1 ATK counter on Blue Diamond Witchwand.When damage is dealt with Blue Diamond Witchwand, remove all +1 ATK counters from it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You pay 1 less to play Cold Forged Hammer for each [Frost] ally in your party.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the start of each player's turn, if he didn't take the last turn, he takes an extra turn after this one.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Allies in your party have frost resistance.(Prevent all frost or [Frost] damage that those allies would be dealt.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the start of your turn, put a spell counter on Gladiator's Spellblade.If your hero would deal damage, it deals that much +1 for each spell counter instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each opponent can't draw cards unless he pays 1 for each card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When a [Holy] ally in your party deals damage, it also heals that much from your hero.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you strike with Lohn'goron, your hero has long-range this combat.Exhaust an ally in your party It deals 1 ranged damage to target hero.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Merciless Gladiator's Greatsword enters play or you strike with it, your hero deals 1 melee damage to each opposing hero and ally.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Cards in play you control can't be removed from the game.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When The Oathkeeper enters play, choose an oath: I won't play cards; or I won't draw cards.You can't break that oath.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Other cards in play have their printed text a second time. (For example, if a card has the text, Allies have +1 ATK, treat it as though it says that twice.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: When a resource enters play under your control, put a +1 ATK counter on Vengeful Gladiator's Bonecracker.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Wand of Biting Cold enters play, target hero or ally can't attack this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy Electrified Dagger Your hero deals 2 nature damage divided as you choose to any number of target [Horde] heroes and/or allies.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy Glacial Blade Your hero deals 1 frost damage to target [Alliance] hero or ally. If a hero is dealt damage this way, its controller skips drawing his next card this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Pay 2 to complete this quest.Reward: Reveal the top three cards of your deck. Put a revealed [Alliance] card into hand and the rest on the bottom of your deck.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Pay 3 to complete this quest.Reward: Draw a card. You may choose a counter on target card in play and add another of those counters to it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Pay 1 to complete this quest.Reward: Target opponent chooses an ally in his party. When that ally is destroyed this turn, draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Pay 2 to complete this quest.Reward: Reveal the top three cards of your deck. Put a revealed [Horde] card into hand and the rest on the bottom of your deck.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Pay 3 to complete this quest.Reward: Draw a card. You may remove a counter from target card in play.

card.name: Final Message to the Wildhammer, The

property.name: Rules
property.value: On your turn, pay 2 to complete this quest.Reward: Draw a card. Put a Message item token into play with If your hero would be dealt damage, it's dealt that much +1 instead. At the start of your next turn, remove that item from the game.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Pay 4 to complete this quest.Reward: Each player chooses an ally in his party. If you chose the ally with the highest ATK, draw two cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You pay 1 less to complete this quest for each [Nature] ally in your party.Pay 3 To complete this quest.Reward: Draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Pay 3 to complete this quest.Reward: Draw a card, or two cards if two or more allies have the same name.

property.name: Rules
property.value: If you control a location, pay 1 to complete this quest.Reward: Draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Pay 3 to complete this quest.Reward: Draw a card, or two cards if an opponent has a Blood Elf, Draenei, or Demon in his party.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Pay 2 to complete this quest.Reward: Choose a rarity, then reveal the top three cards of your deck. Put a revealed card with that rarity into hand and the rest on the bottom of your deck.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Revenge is Tasty enters play exhausted.Pay 2 to complete this quest.Reward: Draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Pay 4 to complete this quest.Reward: Draw a card. You may shuffle your graveyard into your deck.

card.name: Someone Else's Hard Work Pays Off

property.name: Rules
property.value: On your turn, pay 3 to complete this quest.Reward: Put a unique Ethereal ally token named Cryo-Engineer Sha'heen into play with 1 [Melee] ATK / 1 health and At the start of your turn, remove this token from the game. If you do, gain control of target ability or equipment.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Soup for the Soul enters play exhausted.Pay 4 to complete this quest.Reward: Draw two cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Turn one of your other face-up resources face down to complete this quest. Reward: Draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Super Hot Stew enters play exhausted.Pay 6 To complete this quest.Reward: Draw three cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Night Elf Hero Required; On your turn: 1, Ready target Night Elf in your party. It can't attack this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: On your turn: 1, When target [Alliance] ally in your party next deals damage to an ally with lower cost this turn, draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Human Hero Required; If a Human ally is in your party: You pay 2 less to play your next ally this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Troll Hero Required; At the start of your turn, choose a Troll in your party, and it may heal 1 damage from itself.

property.name: Rules
property.value: On your turn: 1, When target [Horde] ally in your party next deals damage to an ally with higher cost this turn, draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Tauren Hero Required; Tauren in your party have +1 health.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you draw a card, add a capture counter., Remove five capture counters Turn target resource face down.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the start of your turn, if you have more allies than each opponent, add a capture counter., Remove four capture counters Put four Halaani ally tokens into play with 1 [Melee] ATK / 1 health.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When an opposing ally is destroyed, add a capture counter., Remove three capture counters Draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the start of your turn, add capture counters equal to the combined cost of allies in your party., Remove 200 capture counters Gain control of all cards in play except heroes.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When an opposing ally is destroyed, add a capture counter., Remove four capture counters Each opposing hero deals 4 nature damage to itself.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When an opposing ally is destroyed, add a capture counter.On your turn: 2, , Remove two capture counters Put an ally card with cost 2 or less from your graveyard into play.
